programme.title: The White Lion
programme.desc: The white lion is advised to be wary about his kinsmen, that they do not love him as much as she loves them. Will he heed to the advise?

programme.title: Bombshell In Love
programme.desc: All the villagers sees queen as a savior, they willingly give her their children for support. This soon goes sour as her greed exposes her weaknesses.

programme.title: Tales Of Ada
programme.desc: Ada, a smart girl who wants to be educated is at the mercy of her father who will do everything not to invest in her education.

programme.title: Too Sweet To End
programme.desc: After Gerald goes blind, his friend, Benard takes advantage of the situation and begins an affair with his wife, Lavender.

programme.title: Bride And Pride
programme.desc: After Raymond and kendra get married, everything goes sour, and Ray becomes broke. This triggers another side of kendra.

programme.title: Seventh Princess
programme.desc: Princess Ijeoma will steal any spoon she sets her eyes on because of a curse on the kingdom. The king must save her child and save the disgrace of her stealing in the kingdom.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: Phoebe dated her flat mates fiancee Jerry right under her nose, everything is about to come to an end as Kate finds out and would do the worst to pay back.

programme.title: Cry Of Royalty
programme.desc: The king of Umuchu will do everything to get a wife following the deadline he is given. Now that he has found a Queen, princess Linda will do everything to make this fail.

programme.title: Lagos Life
programme.desc: Faith regrets having a son, she tries abandoning him but later finds a friend in the city that makes her sell him. Everything seems fine with her until his father shows up.

programme.title: Above Her Age
programme.desc: Faithful is determined to do everything to ensure her parents stay together forever. However, her hopes for happiness are shattered when she discovers a secret.

programme.title: The Mafia King
programme.desc: Two princes, both heirs to the throne engage in a fierce and unscrupulous battle to claim the throne after their fathers death.

programme.title: Devils Desire
programme.desc: Eric had a thing with his wifes friend Toki, now she tries to scheme her way into the house through all means possible.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna rejects her suitor. Princess Ahunna tells Ejike why she refuses to marry him. Maduka says his farewell.

programme.title: Particles Of Jealousy
programme.desc: After a one-night stand, Prince Izunna falls in love with Bianca, but this love is short lived as Bianca is accused of cheating.

programme.title: For Better For Love
programme.desc: Hillary ends his relationship with Brenda because she tells him the truth about his parents, now in a relationship with Stella, he is about to have the biggest regret of his life.

programme.title: Untimed
programme.desc: Alfred starts up a family without telling his wife that he has a daughter Mmasi. Mmasi moved into his house but he has to keep this secret to himself or his house tears apart.

programme.title: In His Shoes
programme.desc: Uche lost all feelings for his wife Ebube after she gives birth to their baby girl. Their story is about to change as Uche losses his job.

programme.title: Discovery
programme.desc: A relentless womanizers world shatters when he suffers a stroke.The consequences of his infidelity takes an unforeseen turn when his wife gathered some information.

programme.title: The Love Battlefield
programme.desc: Mmesoma wants to marry so she can escape the quarrels from her parents at home. Will she find peace after she is married?

programme.title: Changing Times
programme.desc: Despite Uncle Godfreys advice to baby Kanife, his nephews wife, she decides to be stubborn despite her pregnancy, decision that might ruin something.

programme.title: Babyna
programme.desc: Years ago, BabyNa was impregnated and abandoned by Ejiofor in the village. Now, she discovers he is married to Isabella, but beneath Isabellas beauty lies a secret.

programme.title: No More Love
programme.desc: James, forever haunted by his vow never to love again wrestles with the bittersweet reality.

programme.title: Kafaya Faya
programme.desc: Mercy Johnson stars in this thrilling drama as Kafaya, a local tailor finds her way into the home of her client after getting pregnant for her clients husband.

programme.title: Moment Of Truth
programme.desc: Max is accused by his wife for being impotent, little did she know that her friends children belong to her husband. This brews war as Max starts asking questions.

programme.title: Comedy Nites
programme.desc: Laugh after laugh, you want to take a bathroom break before we get started- Its that good. Its a half hour of side splitting Stand-up comedy from a range of comedians.

programme.title: Lost But Found
programme.desc: After losing her mother, a young lady silently battles an ailment till it grows to a deadly stage. Its now up to her friends to ensure she finds hope again.

programme.title: Dibia
programme.desc: The rains are late and only the Dibia is believed to have the solution. King Azuka is reluctant to have anything to do with him as the Dibia is known to make very eccentric demands.

programme.title: Visa On Arrival
programme.desc: We all know how hard it can be to outplay Officer Charity, but this applicant comes with her A-game. While another visa applicant couldnt make the money go around our Visa Officers.

programme.title: Visa On Arrival
programme.desc: Officer Okoro has a sixth sense and can tell when you are lying, so hes on high alert when an applicant tries to act smart with him.

programme.title: Game Of Fate
programme.desc: Elena is a workaholic with zero social life and her mother plays a game of fate at a club on her behalf and wins her a date with Danie. He is bent on making her lose everything.

programme.title: Her Desire
programme.desc: A couples home is put to test when the husband cousins pay a visit, and the unsatisfied wife starts to have an affair with him.

programme.title: Chatter That Counts
programme.desc: A lively talk show with five vibrant Gen Z hosts, offering insights on life and business through fun games, music, and talks, while highlighting inspiring SME success stories.

programme.title: The Next Titan

programme.title: Visa On Arrival
programme.desc: Officer Charity gives a dreadlocked applicant a hard time. A trust fund baby and his friends try to convince Officer Okoro.

programme.title: Visa On Arrival
programme.desc: Officer Frances is taken back when a street-smart white man challenges him while Officer Charity berates three young women who want to take a much-needed girls trip.

programme.title: Big Brother Naija: Eviction Shows
programme.desc: Tension, drama, and unexpected twists shake the Big Brother Naija house as Season 10 housemates battle to avoid eviction and strive to emerge as the certified ultimate winner.

programme.title: Making Omelettes
programme.desc: A busy father commits a financial crime at work and then pens down an emotional apology letter to his family whom he has neglected for so long to reveal unimaginable secrets.

programme.title: Akudo

programme.title: The Obdurate
programme.desc: Ijeoma is refuses all the rich suitors that comes for her hand in marriage, because her sisters manipulate her out of jealousy. Now she has placed a curse on them never to be happy.

programme.title: Deadline: Crime With Tamron Hall
programme.desc: When Cabretti Wheeler and his friend Kyle Ellis are killed in Florida the only eye-witness vanishes. The mum of one of the victims risks her own life for justice.

programme.title: Diabolical: Deadly Love
programme.desc: In Nevada, a beloved father is found dead in his car. As witnesses point to the victims brother-in-law, detectives must get to the bottom of a deadly conspiracy.

programme.title: Seduced To Slay
programme.desc: When a mans childhood friend moves in with him and his family, a sinister seduction leads to a cold-blooded murder in Buford, Georgia.

programme.title: On The Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Police must analyse a long emotional and rage-filled 911 call. Was it made by a distraught husband or a killer trying to cover his tracks?

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: The body of a beauty queen is found floating in a lake. As officers dig deeper into her list of admirers, they discover the fine line between love and hate.

programme.title: Swamp Murders
programme.desc: A teenager is found bleeding to death along Deep Creek Spillway, leaving police with all kinds of questions. Detectives turn to a mysterious phone number for help.

programme.title: The Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: Debbie Smith gets the call every mother fears: her son, Matthew, has died at college. Police learn it was more than an accident - could those closest to him be to blame?

programme.title: The Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: When a mother vanishes without a trace, police believe she left by her own volition. But, her mum knows she would never abandoned her children and vows to find her.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: A 20-year-old disappears on the long drive home from her fiances place. Investigators suspect that someone from law enforcement might be responsible.

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: Two 20-year-olds suffer personal tragedies then have their own lives abruptly taken. Will their families be able to prove what really happened?

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Cindy Monkman is looking for something serious and Michael Apelt seems to be her perfect match, until their first Christmas together turns into a horror story.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Roger Harris and his wife Donna built their dream home in Florida, but just after the birth of their second son, a vile secret threatens their sweet, simple life.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.sub-title: Got A Gun Made Of Toilet Paper
programme.desc: Inmate Kerry Silvers decided to escape jail, along with two other prisoners they overpowered several guards and calmly walked out of prison.

programme.title: A Body in the Basement
programme.desc: When friends find Brad McGarry shot dead in the basement of his Ohio home, evidence suggests a robbery but soon a more complicated motive emerges.

programme.title: Brittany Murphy: An ID Murder Mystery
programme.desc: The world is stunned when Hollywood superstar Brittany Murphy dies at age 32. As lurid allegations swirl, her father searches for answers.

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: In the fall of 1991, rural Michigan is plunged into paranoia when four teenage girls vanish. Residents face up to the possibility that a predator is among them.

programme.title: A Killer Among Friends

programme.title: The Legend Of Drunken Master
programme.desc: A young martial artist is torn between respecting his pacifist father and stopping some priceless artefacts from being stolen.

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: A promising student decides to tour some of the countrys best colleges before choosing where shell study - but her cop dad insists on joining her.

programme.title: Force Of Nature
programme.desc: A cop tangles with a criminal gang targeting a building hes trying to evacuate before a hurricane hits. But help comes from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Running With The Devil
programme.desc: A drug kingpin sends two of his top people to find out why a consignment of cocaine was highjacked and cut while en route from Mexico to Canada.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Eccentric caretaker Mr Bean works for the British National Gallery. Keen to fire him, the museums board of directors send Bean to Los Angeles.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.

programme.title: Fat Albert
programme.desc: When teenager Doris cries into the remote, TV characters Fat Albert and the Cosby kids magically emerge from the screen and into the real world.

programme.title: Paw Patrol: The Movie
programme.desc: The pups are called into action and find another four-footed friend after Mayor Humdinger takes up a new role in Adventure City and causes chaos.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A young Viking from a clan of fierce dragon-slayers changes the lives of everyone around him when he decides to befriend an injured dragon.

programme.title: Are We Done Yet?
programme.desc: Two newlyweds move to the suburbs in the hope that it will provide their kids with a better life - but the relocation doesnt go smoothly.

programme.title: Mean Girls 2
programme.desc: When tomboy Jo Mitchell moves to a new high school, a mean-spirited clique of girls makes life difficult for her and her new friend.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: The Minions are presented in an original story that showcases their unpredictable personality and physicality.

programme.title: Minions: The Rise Of Gru
programme.desc: A teen Gru and his minions idolise the Vicious 6 band of supervillains, but when he unexpectedly gets a chance to become their leader, chaos ensues.

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: After the attempted assassination of the Chinese Ambassador, Carter and Lee head to the Paris streets to protect a woman with insider Triad knowledge.

programme.title: Tai Chi Master
programme.desc: Two childhood friends, on opposite sides of a civil war after being expelled from their Shaolin temple, journey toward a deadly final showdown.

programme.title: The Legend
programme.desc: An accomplished kung-fu master, who secretly loves a wealthy merchants daughter, sets out to win a martial-arts contest in which she is the prize.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A debt drags assassin John Wick back into the criminal underworld, but when a price is put on his head, every killer in the business comes calling.

programme.title: Faith Heist
programme.desc: When a crook brazenly swindles a community church out of its roof repair fund, a preacher seeks help from a former criminal to get the money back.

programme.title: Money Plane
programme.desc: A professional thief decides that robbing a flying casino, filled with some of the worlds biggest criminals, is the solution to his financial woes.

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: Tom Lowes documentary, taking in more than 35 countries and narrated by Liv Tyler, examines themes including space, time and human existence.

programme.title: College Road Trip
programme.desc: A promising student decides to tour some of the countrys best colleges before choosing where shell study - but her cop dad insists on joining her.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out Of...
programme.sub-title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out Of Water
programme.desc: Chaos ensues in Bikini Bottom after Plankton tries to steal the Krabby Patty Secret Formula. Its down to SpongeBob and his pals to get it back.
